verses.verse: But in the latter <S%H319><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> it will happen that the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s temple <S%H1004><s%> will be established <S%H3559><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and it will be exalted <S%H5375><s%> above the hills; <S%H1389><s%> and peoples <S%H5971><s%> will stream to it. <S%H5102><s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> "Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us go up <S%H5927><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> and he will teach <S%H3384><s%> us of his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and we will walk <S%H3212><s%> in his paths. <S%H734><s%>" For out of Zion <S%H6726><s%> will go forth <S%H3318><s%> the law, <S%H8451><s%> and the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> from Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%>

and he will judge <S%H8199><s%> between many <S%H7227><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and will decide <S%H3198><s%> concerning strong <S%H6099><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> afar off. <S%H7350><s%> They will beat <S%H3807><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> into plowshares, <S%H855><s%> and their spears <S%H2595><s%> into pruning hooks. <S%H4211><s%> Nation <S%H1471><s%> will not lift up <S%H5375><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> against nation, <S%H1471><s%> neither will they learn <S%H3925><s%> war any more. <S%H4421><s%>

But they will sit <S%H3427><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> under his vine <S%H1612><s%> and under his fig tree; <S%H8384><s%> and no one will make them afraid: <S%H2729><s%> For the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

Indeed all <S%H376><s%> the nations <S%H5971><s%> may walk <S%H3212><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of their gods; <S%H430><s%> but we will walk <S%H3212><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>

"In that day, <S%H3117><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "I will assemble <S%H622><s%> that which is lame, <S%H6760><s%> and I will gather <S%H6908><s%> that which is driven away, <S%H5080><s%> and that which I have afflicted; <S%H7489><s%>

and I will make <S%H7760><s%> that which was lame <S%H6760><s%> a remnant, <S%H7611><s%> and that which was cast far off <S%H1972><s%> a strong <S%H6099><s%> nation: <S%H1471><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will reign <S%H4427><s%> over them on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> from then on, <S%H5704><s%> even forever. <S%H5769><s%>"

You, <S%H4026><s%> tower of the flock, <S%H5739><s%> the hill <S%H6076><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> to you it will come, <S%H857><s%> yes, <S%H7223><s%> the former dominion <S%H4475><s%> will come, <S%H935><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Now why do you cry <S%H7321><s%> out aloud? <S%H7452><s%> Is there no king <S%H4428><s%> in you? <S%H3289><s%> Has your counselor perished, <S%H6><s%> that pains <S%H2427><s%> have taken <S%H2388><s%> hold of you as of a woman in travail? <S%H3205><s%>

Be in pain, <S%H2342><s%> and labor to bring forth, <S%H1518><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> like a woman in travail; <S%H3205><s%> for now you will go forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the city, <S%H7151><s%> and will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and will come even to Babylon. <S%H894><s%> There you will be rescued. <S%H5337><s%> There Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will redeem <S%H1350><s%> you from the hand <S%H3709><s%> of your enemies. <S%H341><s%>

Now many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> have assembled <S%H622><s%> against you, <S%H559><s%> that say, "Let her be defiled, <S%H2610><s%> and let our eye <S%H5869><s%> gloat <S%H2372><s%> over Zion. <S%H6726><s%>"

But they don't <S%H3045><s%> know the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> neither do they understand <S%H995><s%> his counsel; <S%H6098><s%> for he has gathered <S%H6908><s%> them like the sheaves <S%H5995><s%> to the threshing floor. <S%H1637><s%>

Arise <S%H6965><s%> and thresh, <S%H1758><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion; <S%H6726><s%> for I will make <S%H7760><s%> your horn <S%H7161><s%> iron, <S%H1270><s%> and I will make <S%H7760><s%> your hoofs <S%H6541><s%> brass; <S%H5154><s%> and you will beat in pieces <S%H1854><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> peoples: <S%H5971><s%> and I will devote <S%H2763><s%> their gain <S%H1215><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and their substance <S%H2428><s%> to the Lord <S%H113><s%> of the whole earth. <S%H776><s%>
